patthana16.49:1.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ hetuñceva sahetukañca dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho nahetu ceva naahetuko ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana16.49:2.1: Anidassanaappaṭighaṁ sahetukañceva na ca hetuṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasanidassanasappaṭigho naahetuko ceva nanahetu ca dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
